pageTitle: Difference between revisions of "Category:OWASP AppSec Conference" - OWASP
TableContextTimeStampAfterTable: {55030=OWASP AppSec conferences bring together industry, government, security researchers, and practitioners to discuss the state of the art in application security. This series was launched in the United States in 2004 and Europe in 2005. Global AppSec conferences are held annually in North America, Latin America, Europe, and Asia Pacific. Additionally, regional events are held in locations such as Brazil, China, India, Ireland, Israel, and Washington D.C. Presentations and videos are generally posted several months after each conference.}
textBeforeTable:
Global AppSec Events Interested in Sponsoring? View Sponsorship Documents Check out OWASP's conferences for the past two years on Google Maps. Local chapters can plan half or full-day events in their region, please contact us for support getting your event organized. Additional information can be found on the How_to_Host_a_Conference page. OWASP AppSec conferences bring together industry, government, security researchers, and practitioners to discuss the state of the art in application security. This series was launched in the United States in 2004 and Europe in 2005. Global AppSec conferences are held annually in North America, Latin America, Europe, and Asia Pacific. Additionally, regional events are held in locations such as Brazil, China, India, Ireland, Israel, and Washington D.C. Presentations and videos are generally posted several months after each conference. Revision as of 16:03, 31 May 2013 [[Category:OWASP AppSec Conference]]   [[Category:OWASP AppSec Conference]]
